title: Call it courage
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
brief_description: A South Seas youth attempts to overcome his fear of the sea by sailing beyond the security of his island’s barrier reef. For young Mafatu, this simple trip becomes both a journey into peril, and a journey into manhood. Based on the novel of same title by Armstrong Sperry.
creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Productions and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
